title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The report displays the same results regardless of the Content Type property of the dynamic text element. No matter if it is set to Auto, Plain, or HTML, the output remains unchanged.
EB: I expect different results based on the Content Type property of the dynamic text element. When set to Plain, I expect the literal content, including tags, to be displayed. When set to Auto, I expect properly rendered content without HTML or RTF tags. When set to HTML, I expect the content to be displayed without HTML tags, except for content 3, which should appear exactly as it is with RTF tags. Please refer to the attached report for more details.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
  1. Open the report in question.
  2. Locate the dynamic text element with the Content Type property.
  3. Set the Content Type property to Plain.
  4. Inspect the report output.
  5. Repeat steps 2-4, but set the Content Type property to Auto.
  6. Repeat steps 2-4, but set the Content Type property to HTML.
  7. Compare the output of each step to observe the lack of any changes.
